title: Nude in Bathtub
credit_line: Acquired through the generosity of the Sarah Mellon Scaife Family
provenance_text:
Pierre Bonnard [1867-1947], France, until 1947; estate of Pierre Bonnard, France, 1947; Private collection, Paris, France, 1948; Mr. [1897-1984] and Mrs. Charles Zadok, New York, NY, by 1964 [1]; Mrs. Eugenia "Genia" Zadok [1900-1988], New York, NY; purchased by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1970. 

Notes:
[1]. They lent the painting to the exhibition "Bonnard and his Environment", October 1964-May 1965.
